items.name: marquee
items.title: Marquee
items.description: A smooth scrolling marquee component that displays content horizontally or vertically with customizable animation options.

items.name: transition-panel
items.title: Transition Panel
items.description: A transition panel component that smoothly animates between different content states with customizable transitions and variants using Framer Motion.

items.name: animated-number
items.title: Animated Number
items.description: A smooth animated number component that transitions between numeric values with customizable spring animations using Framer Motion.

items.name: scroll-active-section
items.title: Scroll Active Section
items.description: A powerful scroll-based component that displays content on the left side while showing an active item preview on the right. Perfect for showcasing features, timelines, or step-by-step processes.

items.name: scroll-eveal
items.title: Scroll Reveal
items.description: A reveal animation component that animates opacity and position when entering the viewport.

items.name: scroll-progress
items.title: Scroll Progress
items.description: A scroll progress indicator with a numeric badge and reveal animations.

items.name: scroll-opposite
items.title: Scroll Opposite
items.description: A scroll-driven animation component that moves two columns in opposite directions as you scroll, creating a dynamic visual effect.

items.name: parallax-scroll
items.title: Parallax Scroll
items.description: A parallax scroll effect component that creates a smooth sliding animation with text overlays as the content scrolls into view.
